allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete ClickUp Dashboard with all features

This dashboard provides comprehensive analysis of ClickUp CSV exports with the following features:

- CSV import with flexible column mapping
- Dark mode support with pure black background and proper contrast
- Intern management system (40h vs 80h capacity)
- Visual badges for intern identification across all tables
- Multiple dashboard views: Overview, People, Projects, Capacity, Estimated vs Real
- Project filtering across all dashboards
- Interactive charts with Recharts
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Complete documentation in README.md

Tech stack: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Recharts
